column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////6. Paella Valenciana was a tad too 'al dente' for me. It's unfortunate that if you're here on a date and want to try this
column2: you must get a minimum of 2 servings. Two servings is enough for about 4-5 people
column3: and with all those tapas to order
column4: well you do the math. I was so stuffed I never wanted to eat again.
